item.title: 加拿大最大养老金计划悄然放弃净零目标
item.description: 加拿大养老金计划投资委员会（Canada Pension Plan Investment Board）在制定到 2050 年实现净零排放的目标仅三年后，就放弃了这一承诺。【原文：Canada Pension Plan Investment Board dropped its commitment to achieve net zero emissions by 2050 just three years after establishing the target.】

item.title: 摩洛哥力争到 2030 年将世界杯发电量翻一番
item.description: 摩洛哥能源过渡大臣莱拉-贝纳利（Leila Benali）表示，摩洛哥计划到 2030 年将其发电能力提高一倍以上，届时摩洛哥将成为国际足联世界杯的联合主办国。【原文：Morocco plans to more than double its power generation capacity by 2030, when it co-hosts the FIFA World Cup, Energy Transition Minister Leila Benali said.】

item.title: 美国时装回收初创企业将在法国建 5 亿美元工厂
item.description:
总部位于弗吉尼亚州的Circ公司将激励措施和监管环境视为美国在清洁技术领域退缩的原因。【原文：

Virginia-based Circ cites incentives and the regulatory environment as draws amid a US retreat from clean tech support. 

】

item.title: <strong>减少疟疾，治疗受感染的蚊子</strong
item.description:
蚊子正在对杀虫剂产生抗药性，因此科学家们希望用能杀死致病寄生虫的药物来治疗蚊子。【原文：

Mosquitos are becoming resistant to insecticide, so scientists want to treat them with drugs they say can kill the parasite that causes the disease.

】

item.title: 花旗银行、日本三井物产等银行加强公私基金混合交易
item.description: 花旗集团（Citigroup Inc. ）和三井住友银行（Sumitomo Mitsui Banking Corp. ）等银行正在瞄准混合融资市场的新交易，以应对包括政府发展援助支出大幅下降在内的一系列不利因素。【原文：Citigroup Inc. and Sumitomo Mitsui Banking Corp. are among banks targeting new deals in the market for blended finance, defying a number of headwinds including a significant decline in government spending on development aid.】

item.title: 英国首次在当地蚊子体内发现西尼罗河病毒
item.description: 随着西尼罗河病毒向更多温带地区蔓延，英国首次在蚊子体内检测到该病毒的片段。【原文：The UK has detected fragments of West Nile virus in mosquitoes for the first time as the disease spreads to more temperate regions.】

item.title: 加纳电动自行车制造商获准向瑞士出售二氧化碳排放额度
item.description: Wahu Mobility 是加纳一家生产电动自行车的初创公司，该公司已达成协议向瑞士出售碳信用额度，这标志着在新兴的碳抵消市场上全球第二笔电动车交易。【原文：Wahu Mobility, a Ghanaian startup that manufactures electric bikes, has entered a deal to sell carbon credits to Switzerland, marking the world’s second e-mobility transaction in a nascent market for offsets.】

item.title: 碳清除初创企业 Climeworks 正在裁员 22
item.description: 随着美国政府削减气候激励措施和项目，旨在扭转全球变暖趋势的初创公司面临着一场大裁员。【原文：Climeworks AG is laying off 106 people, as startups that aim to reverse global warming face a reckoning with the US government slashing climate incentives and programs.】

item.title: 美国气候反弹对碳清除造成冲击，Climeworks 将裁员 22
item.description:
这家从空气中提取碳的初创公司正在裁员，因为美国政府撤回了对气候技术的支持，并降低了扩大碳清除规模的希望。【原文：

The startup, which pulls carbon from the air, is reducing staff as the US government pulls back support for climate technologies and dims hopes for scaling up carbon removal. 

】

item.title: 野火肆虐，全球森林损失创历史新高
item.description:
前所未有的气温正在助长火灾。"这是一个全球性的红色警报。【原文：

Unprecedented temperatures are fueling fires. “It’s a global red alert.”

】

item.title: 这台价值 15 万美元的检漏仪将评判氢气对气候的影响有多大
item.description: 由于成本高昂和缺乏工业需求，氢气作为改变游戏规则的气候解决方案的潜力已经受到质疑。然而，人们对氢气的最大担忧之一仍未完全了解：氢气对全球变暖的影响有多大？【原文：Hydrogen’s potential as a game-changing climate solution is already in doubt over its high costs and lack of industrial demand. Yet one of the biggest concerns about the gas is still not fully understood: How much is hydrogen contributing to global warming?】

item.title: 美国西部创纪录的融雪速度威胁另一场干旱
item.description: 美国西部大范围的高温正导致积雪以破纪录的速度融化，从而带来水资源短缺和野火季节提前到来的风险。【原文：Widespread heat across the US West is causing the snowpack to melt at a record-breaking pace, risking water shortages and an early start to wildfire season.】

item.title: 在霍楚尔同意管道建设后，特朗普改变了他对纽约风电场的立场
item.description: 特朗普政府在与纽约州州长凯西-霍楚尔（Kathy Hochul）达成协议，允许在该州修建新的天然气管道之后，又允许长岛附近一个耗资 50 亿美元的风电场恢复建设。【原文：The Trump administration is allowing construction to resume on a $5 billion wind farm off Long Island after reaching a deal with New York Governor Kathy Hochul that could allow new natural gas pipelines to be built in the state.】

item.title: 田纳西流域管理局寻求建造 GE Vernova 反应堆
item.description: 田纳西河流域管理局正在采取措施建造一座小型模块化核反应堆；在数据中心电力需求激增的背景下，这是美国第一家寻求联邦批准建造此类项目的公用事业公司。【原文：The Tennessee Valley Authority is taking steps to build a small modular nuclear reactor — the first US utility to seek federal approval for such a project amid a surge in power demand from data centers.】

item.title: 小组投票后美国对亚洲太阳能设备征收 3,521% 的关税
item.description: 美国政府贸易委员会周二得出结论称，来自东南亚四国的太阳能设备威胁到了国内制造商，美国对这些设备征收的关税即将生效。【原文：US duties on solar equipment from four Southeast Asian countries are now set to take effect, following a government trade commission’s conclusion Tuesday the imports threaten domestic manufacturers.】

item.title: 特朗普加强对电动汽车的攻击，充电设施减少
item.description:
众议院共和党人削减电动汽车补贴的前景有可能使前景更加暗淡。【原文：

The prospect of House Republicans’ cuts to electric vehicle subsidies threatens to further dim the outlook.

】

item.title: 欧洲农业每年因气候风险损失 280 亿欧元
item.description: 一项新的研究显示，由于干旱和洪水等气候风险不断增加，欧盟农业每年损失 280 亿欧元（315 亿美元）。【原文：The European Union’s agriculture industry is losing €28 billion ($31.5 billion) a year due to increasing climate risks, such as droughts and flooding, according to a new study.】

item.title: 劳埃德银行成立银行家团队，专注于二氧化碳和自然信贷
item.description: 劳埃德银行集团（Lloyds Banking Group Plc）已经设立了一个服务台，帮助客户购买碳抵消额度并为其提供资金。【原文：Lloyds Banking Group Plc has set up a desk to help clients buy and finance carbon offsets, as it moves into a market that’s seen a retreat by peers including HSBC Holdings Plc.】

item.title: 欧洲西北部漫长而晴朗的春季引发了风旱
item.description: 欧洲西北部上空异常持续的高压天气系统带来了晴朗的天空，非常适合太阳能发电，但对风能却产生了相反的影响。【原文：Unusually persistent high-pressure weather systems over northwest Europe are bringing sunny skies, perfect for solar generation, but it’s having the opposite effect on wind.】

item.title: 特朗普对纽约 50 亿美元风电场的强硬态度挽救了濒临崩溃的行业
item.description: 特朗普政府出人意料地撤销了停止纽约沿海一个耗资 50 亿美元的风能项目的命令，这给这个在美国前途堪忧的行业带来了一些喘息的机会。【原文：The Trump administration’s surprise reversal of an order to halt a $5 billion wind energy project off the coast of New York offered some respite to a beleaguered industry whose future in the US has been in doubt.】

item.title: 天然气巨头将化石燃料作为遏制排放的最佳途径
item.description: 一些世界领先的天然气生产商向正在努力扩大使用间歇性可再生能源以减少排放的国家推销他们的燃料。【原文：Some of the world’s leading natural gas producers pitched their fuel as the solution to countries grappling with expanding use of intermittent renewables to cut their emissions.】

item.title: 非洲成立航天局填补气候数据空白
item.description:
新组织将协调现有的国家太空计划，发射卫星并建立气象站。【原文：

The new organization will coordinate existing national space programs, launch satellites and set up weather stations.

】

item.title: 日本希望在极端天气归因科学中发挥更大作用
item.description:
国家新研究中心旨在确定气候变化在热浪和台风中的作用

Nation’s new research center aims to pinpoint the role of climate change in heat waves to typhoons

】

item.title: 印度的脏炉子威胁全球钢铁零净排放目标
item.description: 据一家跟踪能源基础设施的非营利组织称，印度的钢铁行业可能决定全球去碳化目标的成败。【原文：India’s steel sector could make or break a key global decarbonization objective, according to a non-profit that tracks energy infrastructure.】

item.title: 特朗普允许停工的纽约海上风电项目复工
item.description: 特朗普政府已经取消了停止在纽约海岸建造价值 50 亿美元的风能项目的命令。【原文：The Trump administration has lifted an order that halted construction on a $5 billion wind energy project off the coast of New York.】

item.title: 阿波罗利用近 10 亿美元私人债务收购 PowerGrid
item.description: 据知情人士透露，阿波罗全球管理公司（Apollo Global Management Inc.【原文：Apollo Global Management Inc. is turning to private credit to finance its acquisition of electric utility PowerGrid Services from Sterling Group, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 美国电池初创公司 ONE 与土耳其 Pomega 签订生产协议
item.description: 美国电池初创公司Our Next Energy Inc.将把部分电池芯生产外包给土耳其Pomega Enerji Depolama Teknolojileri AS公司。【原文：US battery startup Our Next Energy Inc. will outsource some production of its battery cells to Turkey’s Pomega Enerji Depolama Teknolojileri AS.】

item.title: 沃伦领导气候倒退调查，华尔街成为众矢之的
item.description: 民主党参议员伊丽莎白-沃伦（Elizabeth Warren）和谢尔顿-怀特豪斯（Sheldon Whitehouse）发起了一项调查，调查对象是美国最大的银行，调查内容是华尔街在气候承诺上的退缩。【原文：The biggest US banks are the targets of an investigation initiated by Democratic Senators Elizabeth Warren and Sheldon Whitehouse into Wall Street’s retreat from its climate pledges.】

item.title: 美国共和党目标提前结束税收抵免，太阳能公司业绩下滑
item.description: 共和党保守派议员表示，他们已得到领导层的承诺，将提前终止关键的清洁能源税收抵免，这是旨在让唐纳德-特朗普总统的巨额税收和支出方案得以推进的全面协议的一部分，此后太阳能公司股价下滑。【原文：Shares of solar companies slumped after conservative Republican lawmakers said they had secured a commitment from leadership to end key clean-energy tax credits earlier than planned, part of a sweeping deal aimed at allowing President Donald Trump’s giant tax and spending package to advance.】

item.title: 印度为防止夏季停电准备天然气发电车队
item.description: 由于气温飙升导致需求增加，印度采取了紧急措施，要求燃气发电站提高发电量，以确保夏季电力供应不间断。【原文：India has invoked emergency measures that require gas-fired power stations to produce more in order to ensure uninterrupted electricity supply during the summer season, as soaring temperatures boost demand.】
